mapper.insert: insert into motel_reply (motel_num, user_num, motel_reply_sq, content) values(#{motel_num},#{user_num},mote_reply_seq.nextval,#{content})
mapper.select: select * from motel_avg_tb where user_key = #{user_num} and motel_num = #{motel_num}
mapper.update: update ( select * from motel_date_tb where motel_num = #{num} and (motel_date between to_Date(#{checkIn},'RR/MM/dd') and to_Date(#{checkOut},'RR/MM/dd')-1) ) set motel_ready = 'N'
mapper.select: select count(motel_date)as y from motel_date_tb where motel_ready like 'Y' and motel_num = #{motel_num} and motel_date between to_Date(#{motel_checkin},'RR/MM/dd') and to_Date(#{motel_checkout},'RR/MM/dd')-1
mapper.insert: insert into DECLARATION_TB (D_KEY, MOTEL_REPLY_NUM, D_USER_NUM, USER_NUM, DECLARATION_KEY, TRIP_D_DETAILCONTENT) values(DECLARATION_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{reply_num}, #{duser_num}, #{user_num}, #{DECLARATION_KEY}, #{content})

insert into DECLARATION_TB (D_KEY, MOTEL_NUM, D_USER_NUM, USER_NUM, DECLARATION_KEY, TRIP_D_DETAILCONTENT) values(DECLARATION_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{num}, #{host}, #{user_num}, #{DECLARATION_KEY}, #{content})
